page.title: 10Quarries in Peter Tavy Area
page.content: There are quite a few disused quarries in this area.Two of the largest are at Pitts Cleave and Wilminstone.The Pitts Cleave quarry was closed five to ten years ago.It only employed about fifteen people.It quarried igneous stone used for roads and buildings.This quarry closed down because the owners, E.C.C., had too many quarries.Wilminstone quarry closed in the late Fifties, early Sixties when the quarry was almost worked out.The stone was used only for roads.They employed only a small number of people.The site of Wilminstone quarry is now used as an Industrial Estate with three factories there.The old quarry itself is now used for an adventure training area.
